website_summaries.verdict: In addition to the impressive quality typical of Rand McNally, the bonus USA map that comes with it make this world map the best.
pros: Beautiful antique graphics on laminated paper
Bright colors with vivid details that are easy to read
An incredible deal – in addition to a world map, you get a map of the USA in the same size
cons: The material is on the thin side, and prone to developing creases and tears

customer_reviews.title: Better than I’d hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these maps for my boys homework room. These maps are beautiful, large, and easy to read. I added my own touch with DIY walnut stained poplar wood on the top and bottom of the maps to give it a high end look. I hung them with some twine. I’ve received a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Boy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the states would be hard to read as I can't really read the sample photo to well, but they are clear while still being detailed. I really like that although it has a Classic look it is still very colorful. These things are Big though, so make sure you have enough wall space.
customer_reviews.author: Charm1723

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Product
customer_reviews.text: TWICE...I ordered this set of maps and only rcvd 1 both times. Completely disappointing! Was supposed to be a gift for my elderly mother so we can enjoy together while I visited from out of town but now the "special moment" was ruined TWICE! Also, the inconvenience of having to pack both maps separately for returns and drive to UPS! I am not very happy!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only got ONE map!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it’s a great size, pretty clear, looks pretty much as pictured. Cons: I only got one map of the USA. The whole reason I opted for this purchase was because it was a 2 pack of the USA and a World map. If you’re expecting a thicker laminated poster, you’ll be disappointed. It’s pretty thin and will tear easily. The laminate is more like glossy paper. I could have looked past the lack of anticipated quality if I had actually received 2 maps. Why am I even giving this 2 stars?!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Too bright and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Quality of maps is good. (As advertised.) However, these maps do not have "antique looks". Continents and states are saturated with color and brightness, much brighter than appears on this website. Because of this, they also do not look "classy." If you are okay with the super-pigmented hues, these might work for you. Would work well in a kid's room or classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Could be a lot more detailed
customer_reviews.text: US & World Map: A lot of places I expected to find on the maps are not there. I thought, as these were pretty big maps, they wd have more places noted. We use to track our travels but the Grand Canyon and Bali are not noted. (Bali is shown but not named.) Lots of big cities on the US map are missing and there is plenty of room. Can barely see the islands of the caribbean on the world map. Not bad looking. It's just ok.
customer_reviews.author: MoTown

customer_reviews.title: Highly durable. Good price. Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to mark places I have traveled. The maps arrived shrink wrapped in plastic. They where in perfect condition. The maps are heavy duty and are going to work perfectly for my needs. The lamination is perfect for my small dot marking stickers and allows them to be removed and repositioned with out hurting the maps. The large size is great. The maps easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: The Hudson’s

customer_reviews.title: Classis elegance
customer_reviews.text: I used these maps on my office wall, initially to cover space. It has become a reference for work, travel and plain curiosity. Thinly laminated, which I prefer. It is pliable and easily hung with pushpins.
customer_reviews.author: DC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: I love maps. We have several maps and these were a perfect addition to our house. The color is neutral and hangs well enough. I may laminate them or frame at some point. We use dry erase with ours to point things out to the kids.
customer_reviews.author: ln2456

customer_reviews.title: Good maps, better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Like many recent buyers, I was shorted one map. I simply contacted the seller and they shipped the missing map directly and I had it in a few days. This is how customer service should work. Thank you, Swiftmaps! The maps are what I expected. Sturdy, laminated. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: MN2LA

customer_reviews.title: I like big maps (and I cannot lie)
customer_reviews.text: I know these aren't topographical maps but I am surprised, however, that in a U.S. map almost 12 sq. ft. that Lakes Okefenokee, Tahoe, and Pontchartrain are not labeled but lakes Winnipeg and Nipigon in Canada are. Nor can I find Breckenridge or Aspen in CO (maybe small but economically significant). I can see a giant lake outside Burlington, VT that I would love to know the name of. And the World Map? Only two cities north of Yellowknife in Canada are labeled, one city in all of Greenland, and the New Hebrides islands aren't labeled. These maps are for K-12 Americans and I don't mean that in no nice way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE maps
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected. Nice. They arrive rolled, so they didn't lay completely flat on the wall, though I'm not sure how that could have been improved. The lamination is ok, not as thick as I would have preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Good colors, poster should be thicker stock
customer_reviews.text: Good colors to contrast the countries. Disappointed in how thin the paper stock is for the price of these maps.
customer_reviews.author: nedjorg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with the ability to write on the maps with dry erase markers.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and looks excellent hanging in our homeschool room. I love that the kids can write on the maps with dry erase markers. Makes learning geography more hands on and interesting for them which motivates them to learn on their own!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ames

customer_reviews.title: Missing a map
customer_reviews.text: Good but I also only got USA. No world map included
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate details
customer_reviews.text: The lack of attention to detail is ridiculous. Mauritania and Senegal are considered the same country. Random parts of Brazil are painted different colors. Tierra del Fuego is painted as if it’s apart of Chile instead of Argentina. Many adjacent countries are painted the same color. Various islands (e.g. Crete and the Balearics) don’t have the color as the mainland. I understand that this map is more for show, but the inaccuracies are incredibly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really are huge.  Measure.  Size matters.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and just what I wanted but I apparently think my office is bigger than it really is...just make sure u measure. I was lazy and didn't. The quality is great and I love my wall of map!
customer_reviews.author: KareBear

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Old World Type Maps...so gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful!!! Great teaching tool for the grandchildren, and fun to map out travels, and keep track of missionary couples around the world.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Large and dry erasable with that old-school map feel
customer_reviews.text: Our original plan was to attach it to a corkboard and use pins. However, we tacked them up and thanks to the lamination, we can trace all roads weve traveled using dry erase markers. I love how large it is, and the detail. It contains a lot more town names than I thought it would. Same goes for the world map.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend despite creasing easily
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the 2 posters. Would recommend. Pros- Look great Value Laminated, so could draw on them and wipe off Big Cons- They are fairly easy to crease
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, I like the laminate
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, I like the laminate, and the packaging was good. Only problem I have with the world map is that it's not detailed enough. Get what you pay for I suppose. Best to get a detailed map of each Continent if you're really into this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Meza

customer_reviews.title: Timely and professional service
customer_reviews.text: The maps were axactly as described and what I expected. No blemishes or creases. good product
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: These maps just arrived and are not exactly the same as what is shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice maps.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been wanting a world map and this was perfect. Nice details and order contained the US map which was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Niters

customer_reviews.title: Big & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These maps are exactly what I was looking for ! Big enough to read and display on the wall. I have curious kids and we love looking up where things are. These are a perfect conversation starter. Can be framed also. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Nice map...would have been perfect, but...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given five stars...but...They cropped the world map in a way that makes it unsuitable for display.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Good detail and value
customer_reviews.text: Still hanging in my office. Both have good detail and are easy to locate what you are looking for. Great value compared to a map store I visited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick lamination and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. They are thick lamination and durable and large!
customer_reviews.author: Shana R.

customer_reviews.title: World and States maps
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love these, they can see and explore our country and the world.
customer_reviews.author: Snaz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful maps
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, large, and beautiful maps. They are sturdily laminated. And just look lovely hanging in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Stephens

customer_reviews.title: sharp vivid text  and good size
customer_reviews.text: I bought the maps for my grandson, who is not that educationally anxious, but in this case as the maps are good size & with prompting from his mother he appreciates them immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, too expensive to frame
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful, but huge. I had hoped that there would be more detail with a map this large. Also, it's so expensive to find a frame for this size that I have opted to return them.
customer_reviews.author: EMama

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should buy this
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend these maps to anyone that needs a little decor.
customer_reviews.author: James Nowlin

customer_reviews.title: very strong material
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice - just what i wanted, US map shows main roads & highways very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin, rolled, and slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: These maps were delivered today— it is thinly laminated and arrived rolled up. A huge pet peeve as it is now curling onto itself. Also, there is a small ripped portion at the bottom. Will most likely return.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when you paid for 2 maps
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 2 maps. But I recieved only one map (USA)
customer_reviews.author: Dumitru

customer_reviews.title: My kids can learn the map easily by looking at the map every day.
customer_reviews.text: Right size for my kids and perfect on my wall
customer_reviews.author: NING

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought to mount and use to pin places I’ve traveled. Looks great in my office!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it! The maps are huge, laminated, and very detailed. Exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I thought it would be but works great. Comes rolled so needs to spend a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought it would be but works great. Comes rolled so needs to spend a day or so rolled the other way around so it'll straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: lalalulu

customer_reviews.title: so much better in person
customer_reviews.text: so much better in person. It's everything I wanted and more and I am so surprised at the details on this map! worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: nice style of map
customer_reviews.text: Lightly laminated and still not too heavy to hang with tack pins if you want. nice style of map, full size.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my office
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my office walls. Nothing fancy but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thane Callender Petzold

customer_reviews.title: Only one arrived
customer_reviews.text: Nice map... it would just be nice if actually both of them arrived. There was only one in the package. And the colors are little more bright than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Dominika Buck

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE after first order had no map The replacement order came fast, and had both maps. The quality of the maps are fairly good. By laminated they mean the paper itself and not an actual layer of laminat. Looks really good and easy to read plus detailed. Good maps
customer_reviews.author: Sherjeel M Bhatti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color.  Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Looks great on the wall! Handle these maps gently as they are not very thick.
customer_reviews.author: PleaseNoJunk

customer_reviews.title: Great maps!
customer_reviews.text: These maps are beautiful! Way bigger than I thought they'd be and very nicely detailed!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Guarna

customer_reviews.title: One Map
customer_reviews.text: I only received the world map not the US map.
customer_reviews.author: mike dean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality map, poor accuracy on order
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 world maps...was supposed to be one world and one United States.
customer_reviews.author: G Ebbers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful posters. We mounted them on old school poster hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: It says that it’s laminated but it’s not and was damaged when arrived.

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for a Christmas gift and then one for myself I only wish it fit into a frame better
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought one for a Christmas gift and then one for myself I only wish it fit into a frame better
customer_reviews.author: Very happy

customer_reviews.title: Great maps, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO nice!! The lamination makes these great for display or everyday use with dry erase pens!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... get dented and creased unless immediately hung) - but beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Laminating is EXTREMELY thin (expect it to quickly get dented and creased unless immediately hung) - but beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome maps though
customer_reviews.text: I recieved two (2) identical world maps, no US map. Awesome maps though!!
customer_reviews.author: shea friddell

product_meta.title: RMC Classic United States USA and World Wall Map Set (Classic Edition)
product_meta.description: Completely updated and redesigned, RMC of FL's Classic World and United States wall maps series feature eye-catching bold and vivid colors complemented with rich parchement/antique vintage tones that make this the perfect reference piece sure to stand-out and highlight any home or business walls. The precise detail and digital accuracy shows color-matching relief and other physical features without sacrificing the maps readability. Now printed on high-quality 80 lb. paper with enhanced packaging. WORLD FEATURES: Map centered on Africa allowing viewers to see continents complete and intact, Clearly labeled country and city names for easy location, Latitude and longitude indications USA FEATURES: Color-matching relief to show mountain ranges and other elevation changes, Clearly labeled state and city names for easy location, State capitals and National Parks labeled on the map, Time zone indications, Albers projection for even representation of the country. These RMC Series Wall Maps serve not only as a handy reference piece, but as an eye-catching accent for any room or office. These maps look incredible framed, too! This is a two map set - each map is 50" x 32" inches. Only the best from the Swiftmaps line-up of quality wall maps!!
feature_bullets: 2 Map Set - 1 World Map and 1 USA Map
Rolled Wall Maps printed on 80lb Poster Paper - not folded
Each World and USA map is 32x50 inches
Classy World and USA map for business or home
Current United States and World map posters with antique looks

specifications.Manufacturer Part Number: RM CL USA WORLD SET P
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars191 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
